item.title: First article and Entry for r/dataisbeautiful DataViz
item.description: As first article on this R and dataviz dedicated blog, I present to you my entry for the DataViz battle of January 2018. This month and the data source is a .htm webpage containing several algae growthrates according to light and temperature conditions. For this project I used : 1. R for * Data importatation * Data wrangling and cleaning * Final analysis Tableau Public Data exploration Detailed data dashboard So letâ€™s start with R !
